column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Quite delicious Chicago style pizza. There was a wait
column2: but it is Chicago and can be expected. The options felt limited
column3: but they are good at what they do. Be prepared for a cheese overload
column4: but who doesn't like that from time to time. The spinach cheesy bread appetizer was tasty
column5: not at all what I was expecting when I ordered it
column6: but the plate was clean before the pizzas came. Good service
column9: a fairly typical Chicago pizza joint.
